articles.title: BSE Telecom index outperforms ahead of Cabinet meeting; Airtel, Vodafone Idea among top contributor - Indiainfoline
articles.description: The Centre has been holding discussions with the telecom companies before it announces a package to support the stressed sector.

articles.title: Vedanta stock advances nearly 3% after Cairn Energy expects tax issue in India to resolve soon - Indiainfoline
